upgrade_ability_refresher.Name: Refresher
upgrade_ability_refresher.Description: Reset the cooldown of all your abilities and restore all your charges.

upgrade_ablative_coat.Name: Ablative Coat
upgrade_ablative_coat.Description: Provides Bullet Resist but you lose some each time you take Weapon Damage. Loss can only happen once every {s:StackLossFrequency}s. Bullet Resist is restored when out of combat.

upgrade_absorbing_armor.Name: Witchmail
upgrade_absorbing_armor.Description: Taking heavy hits of {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'} from an enemy reduces a random ability cooldown.

upgrade_acolytes_glove.Name: Spirit Strike
upgrade_acolytes_glove.Description:
When you perform a Light or Heavy Melee attack against a hero, deal extra Spirit Damage with the attack and reduce the target's Spirit Resist.

Cooldown is 2x longer for Light Melee hits.

upgrade_active_bullet_shield.Name: Shield Rush
upgrade_active_bullet_shield.Description: Give temporary bullet shield for you and nearby allied Heros and their minions.

upgrade_active_reload.Name: Active Reload
upgrade_active_reload.Description: While reloading, pressing {g:citadel_binding:'Reload'} during the highlighted portion will instantly finish your reload and grant you Fire Rate, Bullet Lifesteal and Move Speed.

upgrade_ammo_scavenger.Name: Ammo Scavenger
upgrade_ammo_scavenger.Description:
Any time you secure or deny a Soul from an entity you get ammo back and gain stacking Spirit Power.
At Max Stacks, gain bonus Sprint speed

upgrade_aoe_silence.Name: EMP Grenade
upgrade_aoe_silence.Description: Throw a grenade that silences enemies and lowers their spirit resistance.

upgrade_aoe_smoke_bomb.Name: Smoke
upgrade_aoe_smoke_bomb.Description:
Give you and teammates invisibility and a move speed bonus. Attacking or taking damage will remove the invisibility.
Cast delay: {s:AbilityCastDelay}s.

upgrade_aoe_tech_shield.Name: Spirit Barrier Pulse
upgrade_aoe_tech_shield.Description: Temporarily gain spirit barrier for you and all nearby allied units.

upgrade_aprounds.Name: Armor Piercing Rounds
upgrade_aprounds.Description: Your Bullets have a chance to become unavoidable, piercing through enemies and ignoring their Bullet Resistance.

upgrade_arcane_eater.Name: Arcane Eater
upgrade_arcane_eater.Description: Your bullets Steal Spirit Power from enemy Heroes. Steal {s:HeadshotBonusSteal} extra Spirit Power with Headshots. This effect stacks.

upgrade_arcane_extension.Name: Duration Extender
upgrade_arcane_extension.Description: Imbue an ability to increase its Duration.

upgrade_arcane_medallion.Name: Arcane Medallion
upgrade_arcane_medallion.Description: Whenever you deal {s:MinimumDamage} Spirit damage or more in a single hit against an enemy hero, gain temporary Spirit Power.

upgrade_arcane_surge.Name: Arcane Surge
upgrade_arcane_surge.Description: When you Dash-Jump the next ability you use will have bonus Range, Duration, and Spirit Power. Lasts up to 7s.

upgrade_arctic_blast.Name: Arctic Blast
upgrade_arctic_blast.Description: Release an expanding ice blast that deals Spirit Damage, Freezing and then Slowing targets it hits. Targets take increased damage while frozen.

upgrade_armor_reduction_debuff.Name: Armor Piercing Rounds
upgrade_armor_reduction_debuff.Description: Your bullets reduce the target's bullet resistance by {s:ResistReduction}% of their current value for {s:AbilityDuration}s and deal bonus damage against bullet shields.

upgrade_belt_fed_magazine.Name: Belt-Fed Magazine
upgrade_belt_fed_magazine.Description: Your weapon gains a much larger magazine that requires spin-up time, starting with a slower initial fire rate and becoming faster over the spin-up time.

upgrade_berserker.Name: Berserker
upgrade_berserker.Description: Your Weapon Damage increases as you take sustained damage.

upgrade_blood_tribute.Name: Blood Tribute
upgrade_blood_tribute.Description: Toggle: Continually sacrifice Health to improve {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'FireRate'}, Debuff Resistance and Move Speed. Healing received is reduced during the sacrifice.

upgrade_boxing_glove.Name: Lifestrike
upgrade_boxing_glove.Description:
Your Melee Attack applies Movement Slow and heals you for 50% of the Melee Damage dealt plus 160.

This heal is 40% effective vs non-heroes.
Cooldown is 2x as long for Light Melee hits.

upgrade_bullet_armor_reduction_aura.Name: Hunter's Aura
upgrade_bullet_armor_reduction_aura.Description: Reduces nearby enemies' Bullet Resist and Fire Rate. If there is only one enemy hero nearby, this effect is tripled.

upgrade_bullet_damage_reduction_aura.Name: Weapon Jammer
upgrade_bullet_damage_reduction_aura.Description: Reduces the Fire Rate of all nearby enemies.

upgrade_bullet_resist_shredder.Name: Bullet Resist Shredder
upgrade_bullet_resist_shredder.Description: Reduces Bullet Resist on enemies when you deal Spirit Damage.

upgrade_burst_fire.Name: Burst Fire
upgrade_burst_fire.Description: Briefly gain Fire Rate and Move Speed when one of your bullets hits an enemy hero.

upgrade_burst_fire_actuator.Name: Burst Fire Actuator
upgrade_burst_fire_actuator.Description: Your weapon fires an additional percentage of your gun's starting clip as a burst. If all bullets in a burst connect with an enemy Hero, gain temporary Base Bullet Damage for the rest of the clip.

upgrade_camouflage.Name: Camouflage Suit
upgrade_camouflage.Description: Go invisible and maintain invisibility by not moving or attacking. Taking damage will not reveal the Hero. Bonus Regen while Invisible.

upgrade_capacitor.Name: Capacitor
upgrade_capacitor.Description: Launch a projectile that deals {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritIcon'}damage, applies a strong slow that recovers over time, prevents Stamina usage and Silences their movement-based items and abilities.

upgrade_cardio_calibrator.Name: Enduring Speed
upgrade_cardio_calibrator.Description: Reduces the effect of enemy Move Speed penalties.

upgrade_chain_lightning.Name: Tesla Bullets
upgrade_chain_lightning.Description: Your bullets have a chance to shock your target. The shock will jump to a nearby enemy.

upgrade_charmed_wraps.Name: Charmed Wraps
upgrade_charmed_wraps.Description: Your abilities get their cooldowns reduced when you perform a heavy melee attack against a hero (or two light melee attacks within {s:LightMeleeTimeWindow}s).

upgrade_chonky.Name: Fortitude
upgrade_chonky.Description: After not taking damage for 13s, gain 2% Max Health Regen.

upgrade_cloaking_device.Name: Cloaking Device
upgrade_cloaking_device.Description: Become invisible. Nearby enemies will temporaily reveal the hero. Attacking or taking damage will remove the invisibility for {s:AbilityCooldown}s.

upgrade_cloaking_device_active.Name: Shadow Weave
upgrade_cloaking_device_active.Description: Become Stealthed. Whenever you take damage while Stealthed you get briefly revealed.

upgrade_close_quarter_combat.Name: Point Blank
upgrade_close_quarter_combat.Description: When in close range to your target, gain Weapon Damage and your bullets apply a Movement Slow.

upgrade_close_range.Name: Close Quarters
upgrade_close_range.Description: Deal additional Weapon Damage when in close range to your target.

upgrade_cold_front.Name: Cold Front
upgrade_cold_front.Description: Release an expanding ice blast that deals Spirit Damage and Slows targets it hits.

upgrade_colossus.Name: Colossus
upgrade_colossus.Description: Gain Bullet and Spirit Resist, and slow the move and dash speed of enemies nearby. Your model size grows by 20%.

upgrade_combo_breaker.Name: Combo Breaker
upgrade_combo_breaker.Description:
Remove all debuffs and heal yourself.
Can be used while stunned.

upgrade_containment.Name: Slowing Hex
upgrade_containment.Description:
Slows movement of enemy target. Also Silences their movement-based items and abilities.
Does not affect target's stamina usage.

upgrade_cooldown_reduction.Name: Superior Cooldown
upgrade_cooldown_reduction.Description: Reduces the Cooldown of your abilities.

upgrade_corpse_explosion.Name: Soul Explosion
upgrade_corpse_explosion.Description: Kills or assists cause an explosion where the victim dies. Kills against heroes have greater radius and damage.

upgrade_counterspell.Name: Counterspell
upgrade_counterspell.Description: Your next parry protects you from the damage and effects of enemy abilities and items. On a successful spell parry {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Heal'} and gain {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'MoveSpeed'} and {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Spirit'}.

upgrade_crackshot.Name: Mystic Shot
upgrade_crackshot.Description: Your next bullet deals bonus Spirit Damage.

upgrade_critshot.Name: Lucky Shot
upgrade_critshot.Description:
Your bullets have a chance to be empowered, causing them to deal bonus weapon damage on hit.
Bonus damage cannot Crit.

upgrade_crushing_fists.Name: Crushing Fists
upgrade_crushing_fists.Description:
Your {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'MeleeDamage'} will restore ammo and apply a stacking bullet resist debuff on enemies. Heavy melee applies 2 stacks.

If the target reaches max stacks, they will be stunned.

upgrade_damage_recycler.Name: Leech
upgrade_damage_recycler.Description: Reduces the effect of enemy applied healing reduction.

upgrade_debuff_reducer.Name: Debuff Reducer
upgrade_debuff_reducer.Description: Reduces the duration of all negative effects applied to you.

upgrade_deflecting_armor.Name: Plated Armor
upgrade_deflecting_armor.Description: Gain a chance to either deflect incoming bullets, preventing all {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'WeaponDamage'} or prevent all on-hit effects from bullets.

upgrade_disarm.Name: Drain Will
upgrade_disarm.Description: Fires a projectile which reduces the Fire Rate of the target and steals Spirit.

upgrade_discord.Name: Scourge
upgrade_discord.Description:
Apply Spirit Resistance and an aura on a friendly target that deals {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritIcon'}damage to enemies proportional to their max health.
Can be self cast.

upgrade_divine_barrier.Name: Divine Barrier
upgrade_divine_barrier.Description:
Remove all non-stun debuffs from the target and provide them with a Barrier and Move Speed.
Can be self-cast. Cooldown is reduced by half when cast on someone else.

upgrade_diviners_kevlar.Name: Diviner's Kevlar
upgrade_diviners_kevlar.Description: Upon casting an ultimate ability gain a Barrier and temporary Spirit Power.

upgrade_double_jump.Name: Double-Jump
upgrade_double_jump.Description: Allows you to perform an additional jump in mid-air.

upgrade_dps_aura.Name: Heroic Aura
upgrade_dps_aura.Description: Provides Bullet Resist to nearby friendly units.

upgrade_drum_magazine.Name: Drum Magazine
upgrade_drum_magazine.Description: Provides a large ammo bonus, and increased reload speed

upgrade_duration_extender.Name: [Deprecated] Duration Extender
upgrade_duration_extender.Description: Increases Duration of your abilities and items by {s:NonImbuedBonusDuration}%.

upgrade_enchanted_holsters.Name: Spellslinger
upgrade_enchanted_holsters.Description:
While in-combat whenever you cast an ability or item, gain a stacking buff that improves fire rate and reload speed.
Each stack refreshes the duration.

upgrade_escalating_exposure.Name: Escalating Exposure
upgrade_escalating_exposure.Description: Dealing Spirit Damage applies a stacking Spirit Amp that increases your Spirit Damage to the target.

upgrade_ethereal_bullets.Name: Mercurial Magnum
upgrade_ethereal_bullets.Description: Your imbued ability charges up over time with {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusSpiritDamage'}, {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusFireRate'}, and reloads bullets on use. Until your next reload, your bullets deal bonus Spirit Damage based on your Spirit Power.

upgrade_express_shot.Name: Express Shot
upgrade_express_shot.Description: After not attacking for 3s, your next attack will fire twice in quick succession with increased damage and velocity. This attack consumes extra ammo.

upgrade_extra_charge.Name: Extra Charge
upgrade_extra_charge.Description: Adds one to your ability max charges.

upgrade_fire_rate_aura.Name: Fire Rate Aura
upgrade_fire_rate_aura.Description: Provides a Fire Rate increase to you and nearby teammates. Different bonus to non-Heroes

upgrade_focus_lens.Name: Focus Lens
upgrade_focus_lens.Description: Target an enemy to Silence them. A portion of all damage dealt during the silence gets applied to the target when the silence wears off.

upgrade_glass_cannon.Name: Glass Cannon
upgrade_glass_cannon.Description: Each hero kill grants permanent Fire Rate (up to a max of 8 times). Death results in the loss of 1 stack.

upgrade_glass_cannon2.Name: Glass Cannon v2
upgrade_glass_cannon2.Description: Each hero kill grants permanent Weapon Damage (up to a max of {s:MaxStacks} times). Death results in the loss of 1 stack.

upgrade_glitch.Name: Curse
upgrade_glitch.Description: Curses an enemy - interrupting, Silencing, Disarming, and preventing item usage. Removes all non-ultimate buffs.

upgrade_greater_withering_whip.Name: Disarming Hex
upgrade_greater_withering_whip.Description: Disarms enemy target and reduces their Bullet Resist.

upgrade_guardian_ward.Name: Guardian Ward
upgrade_guardian_ward.Description:
Provide the target with a Barrier and temporary Move Speed.
Can be self-cast.
Cooldown is reduced by half when cast on someone else.

upgrade_headhunter.Name: Headhunter
upgrade_headhunter.Description: Your next headshot against an enemy Hero deals {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusWeaponDamage'}, {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Heal'} you, and briefly grants {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusMoveSpeed'}.

upgrade_headshot_booster.Name: Headshot Booster
upgrade_headshot_booster.Description: Your next headshot against an enemy Hero deals {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusWeaponDamage'}.

upgrade_headshot_booster2.Name: Weakening Headshot
upgrade_headshot_booster2.Description: Landing a Headshot on Heroes reduces their Bullet Resist.

upgrade_heal_on_level.Name: Patron's Healing
upgrade_heal_on_level.Description: When you receive a Boon, automatically heal.

upgrade_healbane.Name: Healbane
upgrade_healbane.Description: Your Spirit Damage applies Healing Reduction. If an enemy hero dies under this effect, you receive a large heal.

upgrade_healbuff.Name: Healing Tempo
upgrade_healbuff.Description:
Applying {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Heal'} to yourself or an ally grants the target {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusFireRate'} and {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusMoveSpeed'}.

Does not apply on innate Regen or innate Bullet/Spirit Lifesteal.

upgrade_healing_booster.Name: Healing Booster
upgrade_healing_booster.Description: Increases the effectiveness of your healing by 20%.

upgrade_health_regen_aura.Name: Healing Aura
upgrade_health_regen_aura.Description:
Automatically provides a burst of healing to yourself and nearby friendlies every {s:HealInterval} seconds.
Effect does not stack.

upgrade_health_stealing_magic.Name: Spirit Lifesteal
upgrade_health_stealing_magic.Description: Your spirit items and abilities heal you for a percentage of the damage they deal. Heals for less on Non-Heroes and does not work on buildings.

upgrade_health_stimpak.Name: Healing Rite
upgrade_health_stimpak.Description: Grant Regen and Sprint Speed to the target. Gets dispelled if you take damage from enemy players or objectives. Can be self-cast.

upgrade_height_advantage.Name: Height Advantage
upgrade_height_advantage.Description: Gain additional {s:HighGroundBonusWeaponPower}% Weapon Damage when attacking targets that are below you.

upgrade_high_impact_armor.Name: High Impact Armor
upgrade_high_impact_armor.Description: Provides protection against high-damage bullets. Any bullet damage portion above the threshold is reduced by {s:DamageReduction}%.

upgrade_hollow_point_rounds.Name: Hollow Point
upgrade_hollow_point_rounds.Description: When you are above 65% health, deal additional Weapon Damage and your bullets reduce enemy Bullet Resist.

upgrade_imbued_duration_extender.Name: Superior Duration
upgrade_imbued_duration_extender.Description: Increases the duration of your abilities and items.

upgrade_improved_bullet_armor.Name: Bullet Resilience
upgrade_improved_bullet_armor.Description: When below 30% health, gain additional Bullet Resist.

upgrade_infuser.Name: Infuser
upgrade_infuser.Description: Gain Spirit Lifesteal and Spirit Power.

upgrade_inhibitor.Name: Inhibitor
upgrade_inhibitor.Description: Your bullets build up to reduce the target's outgoing damage and apply healing reduction.

upgrade_intensifying_clip.Name: Intensifying Magazine
upgrade_intensifying_clip.Description: Increases Weapon Damage as you continuously fire your weapon.

upgrade_kinetic_sash.Name: Kinetic Dash
upgrade_kinetic_sash.Description: When you Dash-Jump you gain Fire Rate and bonus Ammo until your next reload. Lasts up to 7s.

upgrade_lifestrike_gauntlets.Name: Melee Lifesteal
upgrade_lifestrike_gauntlets.Description:
Your next Melee attack heals you.

This heal is 30% effective vs non-heroes.
Cooldown is 2x as long for Light Melee hits.

upgrade_long_range.Name: Long Range
upgrade_long_range.Description: Deal additional Weapon Damage when beyond a minimum distance from your target.

upgrade_long_range_slowing_tech.Name: Omni Spirit
upgrade_long_range_slowing_tech.Description: Applies a movement slow to enemies when dealing spirit damage.

upgrade_magic_burst.Name: Mystic Burst
upgrade_magic_burst.Description: Charges up over time with {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusSpiritDamage'}, causing abilities dealing more than 80 damage to deal additional damage.

upgrade_magic_carpet.Name: Magic Carpet
upgrade_magic_carpet.Description:
Summon a Magic Carpet that will fly you away. While flying you are immune to slows and doing any action will dismiss the carpet.
Cannot use abilities while the carpet is being summoned.

upgrade_magic_clarity.Name: Clarity
upgrade_magic_clarity.Description: On ability or item use, gain a move speed bonus for {s:AbilityDuration}s. Your next ability cast will remove the move speed bonus and apply a Spirit bonus to that ability.

upgrade_magic_reach.Name: Mystic Expansion
upgrade_magic_reach.Description: Imbue an ability to increase its range and effect radius.

upgrade_magic_shield.Name: Enchanter's Emblem
upgrade_magic_shield.Description: While you are above 65% health, gain bonus {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Spirit'} and Cooldown Reduction.

upgrade_magic_shock.Name: Tankbuster
upgrade_magic_shock.Description: Charges up over time with {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusSpiritDamage'}, causing abilities dealing more than 165 damage to deal additional damage. Ignores Spirit Resistance.

upgrade_magic_slow.Name: Mystic Slow
upgrade_magic_slow.Description: When the target takes Spirit Damage, they have their Move Speed reduced.

upgrade_magic_storm.Name: Surge of Power
upgrade_magic_storm.Description: Imbue an ability with permanent Spirit Power. When that ability is used, gain bonus Move Speed and maintain full speed while attacking.

upgrade_magic_tempo.Name: Compress Cooldown
upgrade_magic_tempo.Description: Imbue an ability to reduce its Cooldown.

upgrade_magic_vulnerability.Name: Mystic Vulnerability
upgrade_magic_vulnerability.Description: When the target takes Spirit Damage, they have their Spirit Resist reduced.

upgrade_medic_bullets.Name: Restorative Shot
upgrade_medic_bullets.Description: Your next bullet will heal you based on what target you hit.

upgrade_melee_charge.Name: Melee Charge
upgrade_melee_charge.Description: Your next Heavy Melee attack against an enemy deals increased damage.

upgrade_melee_rebuttal.Name: Rebuttal
upgrade_melee_rebuttal.Description: On a successful Parry against an enemy Hero, Heal yourself for the damage parried and returns that damage to the target, and temporarily gain increased damage.

upgrade_mod_disruptor.Name: Soul Disruptor
upgrade_mod_disruptor.Description: Throw a grenade that explodes on contact and applies silence and increasing amounts of damage to each enemy.

upgrade_mystic_regeneration.Name: Mystic Regeneration
upgrade_mystic_regeneration.Description: Dealing Spirit Damage to enemy Heroes grants you Bonus Health Regen. Stacks when dealing damage to different heroes.

upgrade_nearby_enemy_boost.Name: Adrenaline Rush
upgrade_nearby_enemy_boost.Description: Gain bonus Weapon Damage and Fire Rate when there are two or more enemy heroes nearby.

upgrade_non_player_bonus.Name: Monster Rounds
upgrade_non_player_bonus.Description: Gain additional 25% Weapon Damage when attacking Troopers, Neutrals and Bosses.

upgrade_non_player_bonus_sacrifice.Name: Cultist Sacrifice
upgrade_non_player_bonus_sacrifice.Description: Target an enemy NPC and consume it for 150% Bonus Souls and grants a powerful long lasting buff.

upgrade_personal_rejuvenator.Name: Rebirth
upgrade_personal_rejuvenator.Description: Respawns the hero at the spot they died.

upgrade_phantom_strike.Name: Phantom Strike
upgrade_phantom_strike.Description: Teleport to an enemy target and pull them to the ground. Dealing damage, Move speed reduction and Disarm.

upgrade_predator_precision.Name: Predator Precision
upgrade_predator_precision.Description: Gain additional weapon damage against enemy Heroes that are low health

upgrade_pristine_emblem.Name: Opening Rounds
upgrade_pristine_emblem.Description: Your attacks have additional Weapon Damage against enemies above 50% health.

upgrade_proc_disarm.Name: Disarming Bullets
upgrade_proc_disarm.Description: Your bullets disarm enemies, them preventing them from shooting their weapon. Victims are immune to disarming bullets for {s:ImmunityDuration}s after application expires.

upgrade_proc_silence.Name: Silencer
upgrade_proc_silence.Description: Your bullets build up to a Silence. Victims are immune to the build up for 10s after silence expires.

upgrade_proc_tech_damage.Name: Magitech Rounds
upgrade_proc_tech_damage.Description: Your bullets also deal your base bullet damage [{s:BaseDamagePerShot}] as spirit damage. Magitech Rounds receives {s:SpellAmplificationMultiplier}x amplification from Spirit Power. Shotguns split the damage between each pellet. This effect can only happen once every {s:ProcCooldown}s.

upgrade_quarantine.Name: Quarantine
upgrade_quarantine.Description: Quarantine an enemy Hero, making them invincible but also silencing and disarming them.

upgrade_quick_silver.Name: Quicksilver Reload
upgrade_quick_silver.Description: Your imbued ability charges up over time with {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusSpiritDamage'}, {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusFireRate'}, and bonus bullets on use.

upgrade_regenerating_bullet_shield.Name: Battle Vest
upgrade_regenerating_bullet_shield.Description: While you are above 65% health, gain {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'WeaponDamage'} and {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusFireRate'}.

upgrade_regenerative_armor.Name: Regenerative Armor
upgrade_regenerative_armor.Description: Gain a short burst of health regeneration when taking bullet damage from heroes

upgrade_reinforcing_casings.Name: Escalating Resilience
upgrade_reinforcing_casings.Description: Grants Bullet Resist when your bullets hit an enemy hero. Each shot can only grant one stack.

upgrade_rescue_beam.Name: Rescue Beam
upgrade_rescue_beam.Description: Heals a target allied hero and yourself for a percentage of Max Health. Once while healing, you can Pull the target towards you. Can be self-cast.

upgrade_resonant_healing.Name: Radiant Regeneration
upgrade_resonant_healing.Description: Heal and gain bonus Movement Speed for a short duration when you cast an ability.

upgrade_return_fire.Name: Return Fire
upgrade_return_fire.Description: Automatically fire a bullet towards any attacker who damages you with their abilities or weapon.

upgrade_ricochet.Name: Ricochet
upgrade_ricochet.Description: Your bullets will ricochet on enemies near your target, applying any bullet procs and dealing a percentage of the original damage.

upgrade_rocket_booster.Name: Majestic Leap
upgrade_rocket_booster.Description:
Launch yourself high into the air and grant yourself a Barrier. While in the air, you can use the active again to drop down faster.

Cannot be used for 5s if attacked by enemy Hero.

upgrade_rocket_boots.Name: Majestic Leap - Disabled
upgrade_rocket_boots.Description: Launch yourself high into the air. Cannot be used for {s:InteruptCooldown}s if damaged by enemy Hero.

upgrade_rupture.Name: Decay
upgrade_rupture.Description:
Inflict damage over time to a target, dealing damage based on their current health.
Decay's damage is non-lethal and does not apply item procs.

upgrade_self_bubble.Name: Ethereal Shift
upgrade_self_bubble.Description:
You enter a void state and become untargetable and invincible for a short duration, during which you float slowly and cannot perform actions. Afterwards you gain Spirit Power, Move Speed, and Spirit Resist.
Can be canceled early.
Activation cancels any active ability.

upgrade_sharpshooter.Name: Sharpshooter
upgrade_sharpshooter.Description: Deal additional Weapon Damage when beyond a minimum distance from your target.

upgrade_slow_immunity.Name: Unstoppable - Deprecated
upgrade_slow_immunity.Description: Purges any roots and chains on use and makes you immune to slows for the duration

upgrade_slowing_bullets.Name: Slowing Bullets
upgrade_slowing_bullets.Description: Your bullets build up a Movement Slow on enemies.

upgrade_slowing_tech.Name: Slowing Spirit
upgrade_slowing_tech.Description: Dealing Spirit Damage applies Movement Slows to your target.

upgrade_spellbreaker.Name: Spellbreaker
upgrade_spellbreaker.Description: The next instance of high spirit damage you take is significantly reduced.

upgrade_spellshield.Name: Hexafoil Ward
upgrade_spellshield.Description: Block the next Spirit Damage or Debuff, preventing its effects. Only regenerates outside of combat.

upgrade_spirit_bubble.Name: Spirit Shielding
upgrade_spirit_bubble.Description: Gain a Barrier whenever you take significant {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'} from enemy Heroes in a small time frame.

upgrade_spirit_burn.Name: Spirit Burn
upgrade_spirit_burn.Description:
Dealing significant Spirit Damage to an enemy within 5s causes an explosion dealing damage and a burn to nearby enemies. While burning, enemies take damage over time and receive reduced healing.
Deals half-damage and has half-cooldown on non-heroes.

upgrade_spirit_sap.Name: Spirit Sap
upgrade_spirit_sap.Description: Target an enemy to reduce their Spirit Resist and Spirit Power.

upgrade_spirit_snatch.Name: Spirit Snatch
upgrade_spirit_snatch.Description:
When you perform a Light or Heavy Melee attack against a hero, the attack deals extra Spirit Damage and steals Spirit Resist and Spirit Power.

Effects are reduced to 70% for Light Melee hits.

upgrade_split_shot.Name: Split Shot
upgrade_split_shot.Description:
Make your weapon fire multishot.

Hitting more than one Hero per attack will grant a stacking weapon damage bonus.

Targets can only be hit once per multishot.

upgrade_sprint_booster.Name: Sprint Boots
upgrade_sprint_booster.Description: Increases your forward move speed over time. Taking damage resets the effect for 1.5s

upgrade_stabilizer.Name: Stabilizer
upgrade_stabilizer.Description: Removes the move speed penalty while shooting, and increases bullet speed.

upgrade_stabilizing_tripod.Name: Stabilizing Tripod
upgrade_stabilizing_tripod.Description: Disarm yourself to toss your weapon to the target location where it transforms into a Field Sentry that will attack enemies using your weapon with an unlimited clip. You can melee the sentry to end the effect early.

upgrade_superacolytes_glove.Name: Hex-Sealed Knuckles
upgrade_superacolytes_glove.Description: After dealing an accumulated {s:StoredSpiritDamage} spirit damage, your next Heavy Melee Attack deals an additional {s:StoredSpiritDamage} spirit damage.

upgrade_suppressor.Name: Suppressor
upgrade_suppressor.Description: When you deal Spirit Damage to enemies, you also reduce their Fire Rate.

upgrade_target_stun.Name: Knockdown
upgrade_target_stun.Description: Apply a Stun after 2s. Stun duration is increased against airborne targets.

upgrade_targeted_silence.Name: Silence Wave
upgrade_targeted_silence.Description:
Launch an expanding projectile which Silences enemies for a short duration and deals impact damage.

Silence does not interrupt channeling abilities.

upgrade_tech_armor.Name: Spirit Armor
upgrade_tech_armor.Description: Reduces the damage you take from Spirit abilities.

upgrade_tech_bleed.Name: Mystic Reverb
upgrade_tech_bleed.Description: Imbue an ability to apply slow on a hit target and deal an additional percentage of the damage dealt to enemies around the target after a short delay.

upgrade_tech_cleave.Name: Quantum Chimaera
upgrade_tech_cleave.Description: Your Tech attacks strike additional nearby enemies for 75% of the total damage.

upgrade_tech_damage_pulse.Name: Torment Pulse
upgrade_tech_damage_pulse.Description: Periodically deals Spirit Damage to the closest two enemies nearby.

upgrade_tech_defense_shredders.Name: Spirit Shredder Bullets
upgrade_tech_defense_shredders.Description: Your bullets apply a debuff that reduces the Spirit Resist of the target and grants you and your allies Spirit Lifesteal against them.

upgrade_tech_overflow.Name: Spiritual Overflow
upgrade_tech_overflow.Description: Gain bonus Fire Rate and Spirit Power by charging up when shooting enemy heroes.

upgrade_tech_purge.Name: Spirit Resilience
upgrade_tech_purge.Description: When below 30% health, gain additional Spirit Resist.

upgrade_tech_range.Name: Greater Expansion
upgrade_tech_range.Description: Increases the range and effect radius of your abilities and items.

upgrade_thermal_detonator.Name: Alchemical Fire
upgrade_thermal_detonator.Description:
Throw a flask that explodes on contact, creating an area that does increasing Spirit Damage per second and reduces enemy Bullet Resist.

50% less effective vs non-heroes.

upgrade_toxic_bullets.Name: Toxic Bullets
upgrade_toxic_bullets.Description: Your bullets build up a Bleed on enemies, causing them to lose a percentage of their Max Health over time. Also applies Healing Reduction on the bleeding target.

upgrade_transcendent_cooldown.Name: Transcendent Cooldown
upgrade_transcendent_cooldown.Description: Reduces the Cooldown of your abilities and items.

upgrade_trophy_collector.Name: Trophy Collector
upgrade_trophy_collector.Description: Whenever you score an assist or kill, gain extra health, sprint, ability range and passive soul generation. This effect stacks and persists through death.

upgrade_ultimate_burst.Name: Lightning Scroll
upgrade_ultimate_burst.Description: Damage from your ultimate applies a {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Stun'} and deals {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusSpiritDamage'} after a short delay.

upgrade_unstoppable.Name: Unstoppable
upgrade_unstoppable.Description:
Temporarily suppress negative status effects and become immune to Stun, Silence, Sleep, Root, and Disarm.
Cannot be used while Stunned or Slept.

upgrade_vampire.Name: Bullet Lifesteal
upgrade_vampire.Description: Your bullets heal you for a percentage of the damage they deal to enemies. Half as effective vs Non-Heroes.

upgrade_veil_walker.Name: Veil Walker
upgrade_veil_walker.Description: Walking through a cosmic veil grants you Stealth, Heal and increased Move Speed.

upgrade_vex_barrier.Name: Reactive Barrier
upgrade_vex_barrier.Description: Automatically restores one stamina and gain a Barrier when you are movement locked, Stunned, Chained, Immobilized, or Slept.

upgrade_warp_stone.Name: Warp Stone
upgrade_warp_stone.Description: Teleport straight ahead, gaining Bullet Resist.

upgrade_weapon_backstabber.Name: Backstabber
upgrade_weapon_backstabber.Description: Attacking enemies from behind with your weapon or melee opens a wound dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDPS'} and reducing their bullet resist. During this time, if you or any allies are near the target, will see them through walls and be given {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusMoveSpeed'}.

upgrade_weapon_detention_ammo.Name: Detention Rounds
upgrade_weapon_detention_ammo.Description: Your bullets build up on enemies, causing them to be tethered to their position.

upgrade_weapon_eater.Name: Weapon Eater
upgrade_weapon_eater.Description:
Reduces Courage by {s:BaseBonusCounter}.
Gain {s:WeaponPowerPerKill} Courage (Up to {s:MaxWeaponPower}) for killing an enemy Hero but lose {s:WeaponPowerPerDeath} gained Courage on Death. Bonus applied if damage was done within {s:KillWindow}s of enemy killed.

upgrade_weapon_instant_reload.Name: Reloader + Huge Clip
upgrade_weapon_instant_reload.Description: Press the [Reload] key while reloading to instantly finish your reload

upgrade_weapon_overdrive_clip.Name: Overdrive Clip
upgrade_weapon_overdrive_clip.Description: Deal non-lethal damage based on your max health to yourself and reload bullets in your clip equal to your max ammo, no matter how many bullets are left. The bullets in this clip have additional courage.

upgrade_weapon_power_and_health_drain.Name: Overdrive
upgrade_weapon_power_and_health_drain.Description: Increase your Courage while draining your own health.

upgrade_weapon_shielding.Name: Weapon Shielding
upgrade_weapon_shielding.Description: Gain a Barrier whenever you take significant {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'WeaponDamage'} from enemy Heroes in a small time frame.

upgrade_withering_whip.Name: Rusted Barrel
upgrade_withering_whip.Description: Target an enemy to reduce their Fire Rate and Bullet Resistance.
